actions.message:
Hello, ${member}! I can see that you need assistance in locating some of my more advanced functions?
Please select from one of the below catagories and type the corosponding command as shown. :)
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: üîê | Moderations Commands | Please Type: `!Moderation`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: üíª | Logging System | Please Type: `!Logging`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: üí∞ | Money & Gambling System | Please Type: `!Gambling`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: üéµ | Music Player | Please Type: `!Music`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: ‚úâ | Ticket System | Please Type: `!Ticket`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: üòÑ | Fun Commands | Please Type: `!Fun`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: ‚úÖ | Useful Commands | Please Type: `!Useful`
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!LogToggle [event_to_toggle]` - Want to enable logs for spesific events? Thats what I'm here for
`!SetLogChannel [#Channel_name]` - Use me to set the default log channel for your server.
`!LogSystem` - Want to view the status of your server? How many channels modified, emoji's changed? Thats what I can do.
`!ToggleAll` - Unlike `logtoggle` I enable logs for every event within your chosen log channel.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!Play [YT_SEARCH OR Link]` - A Music command that not only works with playlists but also supports but links and YT queries.
`!Join` - Want me to join you in the voice channel but not say a word? Here i am!
`!Leave` - Oh so you don't want me in your cool voice chat anymore. I understand. :(
`!ClearQueue` - Don't want anymore tunes after the song ends? Okay i got you.
`!Stop` - Want me to end the tunes now? Okay i got it
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!Pause` - Need to run? Just use me to pause your banging tunes
`!Resume` - When your back just use me to resume them. Easy right?
`!Queue` - Want to see what music you have in your queue? I can do that for you.
`!NowPlaying` - Want to see what song's playing right now?
`!Skip` - Need to skip that one song that you don't want to listen to? I can now do that.

`!Lyrics [song name]` - Want to know the lyrics to the song you just heard? Well thats what this command is built for.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!Volume [1-100]` - To loud? (This will adjust the volume for all players in the VC)
`!NowPlaying` - Want to see what song's playing right now?
`!Skip` - Need to skip that one song that you don't want to listen to? I can now do that.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
**Administrator - REQUIRED**
`!SupportSetup` - Ran **ONLY** by an admin both this sets up the ticketing system by creating a catagory, log channel & Support role if you do not already have one. 
`!ReactSetup` - Ran **ONLY** by an admin both this sets up the ticketing system by creating a catagory, log channel & Support role if you do not already have one.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
**General User Commands**
`!NewTicket [Ticket_Description]` - Allows the execution of new tickets for the support team to manage and further assist you.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
**Support Team Commands**
`!Available-Logs` - Shows you the chat logs available when used in your chosen ticket channel.
`!Download-Log` - Allows you to download the chat logs for future refrence once you've closed your ticket  
`!Inactive` - Unable to solve a ticket? Set it to inactive, you can always reverse it later on
`!Active` - Reverse an inactive channel into an active one.
`!Add [@user]` - Adds the mentioned user to the ticket channel you executed this command in.
`!Remove [@user]` - Remove the mentioned user from the ticket channel you executed this command in.
`!ForceClose` - Want to close a ticket but the user keep talking? Use `forceclose` to force it to end.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!Gay [@user]` - Are you gay? Wanna find out?
`!Dank-Meme` - ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø
`!Kill [@user]` - A list of funny ways your chosen member could have been killed. Joking ofcourse. :)
`!Insult [@user]` - An insult on the target user based on a list of random words.
`!StealPFP [@user]` - Want to be a sneaky boi and steal someones avatar. Well sure!
`!Say [What you want the bot to say]` - Just a little command that gets me to repeat whatever you tell me.
`!Quote` - Quote of the day
`!ShipIt` - Just a little fun way of matchmaking players with each other.
`!RockPaperScissors` - Fancy a fun game of rock paper scissors? I'd play with you but i have no hands. 
`!Pun` - Brighten up your day with a pun from my long listed collection of puns, good and bad. :)
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!Help` - Use this command and i will show you a list of everything i can do.
`!Purge [amount]` - Want to remove some of that spam chat? I can help with that.
`!AutoRole` - Setup the autorole system meaning that new users will automatically be given a role upon joining.
`!Lock [reason]` - Just give me the word and i can lock a channel from @everyone from being able to use it. However those without roles will not be affected.
`!Unlock` - Does the exact opposite to `!lock` and will unlock the locked channel allowing users to type and chat in it again. :D
`!Kick [@user]` - Kicks the mentioned user upon use, however i do require permission to do this first.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!Ban [@user]` - Want to do a little more than just kick someone? Okay i got you!
`!UnBan [@user]` - Now you want to undo your mistake and unban them? Well thats fine i can do that as well.
`!Mute [@user] [Reason]` - Mutes the mentioned user for the reason stated.
`!UnMute [@user]` - Unmutes the mentioned user by removing the Mute role that was applied upon using the `!Mute` command.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!TranslateList` - Provides the user with a link to all the languages that i am able to translate to and from using the `!translate` command
`!Translate [from-language-code] [to-language-code] [text-to-translate]` - I can translate text from one langauge to another. All you have to do is ask me.  
`!ServerInfo` - Wanna know more about this server? Ask and you shell recieve
`!UserInfo [@user]` - Need to know more about someone? Here you go?
`!RoleInfo [@role]` - Want to know more about a spesific role? maybe its the admin role. No matter i'll tell you.
`!DiscordStatus` - Want to know if the discord servers are laggy, have any downtime? I can do that.
`!Bug` - Got an issue with using the bot? I can now report that directly to Shotgn15 for you. :)
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
`!Cash [@user]` - Allows the user to check there current cash balance 
`!Cashboard [Number of people you want to see ranked]` - Shows the user the cashboard for the amount of people mentioned in the second paramater.
`!Deposit [amount to deposit]` - Deposits cash into your bank for safe keeping
`!Withdraw [amount to withdraw]` - Removes cash from your bank for use.
`!Transfer [member] [amount to send]` - Allows you to send money between other members.
`!Gamble [amount to gamble with]` - Allows you to gamble with your money. You may loose cash or maybe even win some.
`Thief [@user]` - You can use this command to steel cash from another user who hasn't banked there's
`!Work` - Work for your money.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
**Admin Commands**

**(9)** `!BlockGamble [@user]` Block a user from gambling until deemed nessessary
**(10)** `!!UnblockGamble [@user]` Unblock a user from gambling when nessessary
**(11)** `!JackPot [price amount] [entrance cost] [max players allowed to enter]` Admins can create there own little jackpot, winner gets all the money, but it dosent come free.
**(12)** `!EditCash [@user] [set|remove|add] [@amount]` Edit the cash of any player in the server.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
Hello, ${member}! Ready to update your changelog? Let's get started!
--
What version is this update?
--
Note: If you ever need to cancel at any point, just type "Cancel"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Ok! I'll remember your version for this changelog is `${serverVars("changelogVersion")}`
--
Now, what changes did you make since the last update?
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Alright! The changes you made since the last update are:

`${serverVars("changelogFeatures")}`

--

Here's a copy of the new changelog, does this look correct?
(If you reply no, then your changes won't be saved.)
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
The following changes were made since the last update!

${serverVars("changelogFeatures")}
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: That's not a valid response! Please reply with either "Yes" or "No"!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Sorry about that! I went ahead and discarded your changes. To restart, rerun this command!

actions.message: üíæ Excellent! I have saved your changes!

actions.message:
Hello, I'm RipperBot, thank you for inviting me!
Before we get started there are a few things i must make you aware of.
 - My Default prefix is `!`. Currently you are unable to change it, howerver that is to change sometime soon.
 - I am currently still in development so some of my features may not function 100% as intended.
 - My help command is `!help` and i do not care where you put capitol letters in your commands. I will still read them. :)

Have Fun!

*Any issues, Contact* 
Shotgn15#6747
